Tool Status

The tool status page contains :

  • Tool Image
  • Tool Name
  • Tool Status
    • Production
    • Installation
    • Maintenance
    • Idle
  • Tool Trends
  • Tool Statistics

Tool Statistics

Statistics button will display pie chart , in which tool status data[Productive , Idle ,Install/Config, Maintenance] is displayed in percentage. The page also contains the utilization timeline of users and projects for the particular tool.

Tool Trends

It is a graphical representation of the tool utilization for production/idle/installation/maintenance of the current month. It's a line chart ,in which X-axis represents hours and Y-axis represents dates.
